Episodes.Title: History 101
Episodes.Plot: Jeff competes to earn the group places in the over-booked 'History of Ice Cream' class, while Abed struggles with the inevitable end of their time at Greendale, causing him to enter a 'happy place' in his mind showing bizarre alternative versions of Greendale. Annie and Shirley pull pranks around the school.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Fred Willard, Irene Choi, Richard Erdman, Charley Koontz, Chelsea Harris, Danielle Kaplowitz, Ben Zelevansky

Episodes.Title: Paranormal Parentage
Episodes.Plot: On Halloween, Pierce accidentally locks himself in his panic room, forcing the gang to search through his house to find the code that unlocks the door.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references

Episodes.Title: Conventions of Space and Time
Episodes.Plot: The study group goes to the annual Inspector Spacetime Convention; Annie enjoys the luxuries of the hotel; Jeff spends time with an Inspector Spacetime fan (Tricia Helfer) in the bar.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Matt Lucas, Tricia Helfer, Chris Tallman, JR Reed, Mark Ryan, Brad Stevens, Summer Stevens, Anthony Liebetrau, Luke Perry, Jennie Garth

Episodes.Title: Alternative History of the German Invasion
Episodes.Plot: The study group starts its European history class with professor Noel Cornwallis (Malcolm McDowell); Dean Pelton is upset when Chang returns to campus.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Malcolm McDowell, Chris Diamantopoulos, David Neher, Richard Erdman, Marc Jablon, Erik Charles Nielsen, Danielle Kaplowitz, Alex Schemmer, Alex Klein, Jeremy Scott Johnson, Brady Novak, Raff Anoushian

Episodes.Title: Cooperative Escapism in Familial Relations
Episodes.Plot: The study group goes to Shirley's house for Thanksgiving dinner; Jeff reunites with his father, who he hasn't seen since he was young.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: James Brolin, Adam DeVine, William Charles Mitchell, Angela Sargeant

Episodes.Title: Advanced Documentary Filmmaking
Episodes.Plot: Dean Pelton asks the study group to help secure a grant for research into Chang's memory loss, while Abed films their efforts for a documentary.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Mike Hagerty, Marc Jablon, Erik Charles Nielsen, Andrea de Oliveira, Lisa Long

Episodes.Title: Economics of Marine Biology
Episodes.Plot: Jeff, Britta and Annie help Dean Pelton recruit a wealthy potential student; Abed starts a fraternity; Troy and Shirley attend a physical education class.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Episodes.GuestStars: Zack Pearlman, Ian Roberts, Richard Erdman, Erik Charles Nielsen, Charley Koontz, Danielle Kaplowitz, Luke Youngblood, Jeremy Scott Johnson, Brady Novak, Lou Volpe, Shannon Welles

Episodes.Title: Herstory of Dance
Episodes.Plot: Britta plans a Sophie B. Hawkins dance to compete with Dean Pelton's Sadie Hawkins dance.
Episodes.GuestStars: Brie Larson, Sophie B. Hawkins, Kristen Henry King, Wendy McColm, Annie Mebane, Jarod Einsohn

Episodes.Title: Intro to Felt Surrogacy
Episodes.Plot: When the study group's balloon ride crashes in the wilderness, the friends encounter a mountain man.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jason Alexander, Erik Charles Nielsen, Sara Bareilles

Episodes.Title: Intro to Knots
Episodes.Plot: Annie invites Professor Cornwallis to Jeff's holiday party in the hope of getting on his good side; when the friends learn Cornwallis intends to give them a bad grade, they decide to take decisive action.

Episodes.Title: Basic Human Anatomy
Episodes.Plot: Annie and Shirley try to bring Leonard down. Troy and Abed re-enact a scene from a body switching film.
Episodes.GuestStars: Richard Erdman, Jerry Minor, Eddie Pepitone, James Kirkland, Craig Michaelson

Episodes.Title: Heroic Origins
Episodes.Plot: Convinced that the study group was destined to meet, Abed pieces together everyone's past revealing that their lives have always been intertwined. Chang tries to destroy Greendale once and for all.
Episodes.Writer: Stephen Basilone, Annie Mebane, Maggie Bandur
Episodes.GuestStars: Joe Lo Truglio, Iqbal Theba, Natasha Leggero, Luke Youngblood, Jordan Black, Alix Elizabeth Gitter, Carla Jimenez, Dusan Brown, Milton T.J. Taylor, Tracy Meyer, Thomas Kasp

Episodes.Title: Advanced Introduction to Finality
Episodes.Plot: With enough credits to graduate, Jeff contemplates his future. The study group once again is faced with the darkest timeline.
Episodes.GuestStars: Joe Lo Truglio, J.P. Manoux, Erik Charles Nielsen, Richard Erdman, Charley Koontz, Danielle Kaplowitz, David Neher, Luke Youngblood, Marcy McCusker
